data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Saint Petersburg territory.
In the minute 1, Ball safe as Saint Petersburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
In the minute 3, Sergey Karasev awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Saint Petersburg at Central Stadium.
Artem Dzyuba is on target to give Saint Petersburg a 0-1 advantage.
Daniil Krugovoy instrumental with a fine assist.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Saint Petersburg needs to be cautious. Ural Yekaterinburg have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Saint Petersburg's Artem Dzyuba misses with an attempt on goal.
Sergey Karasev awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Ekaterinburg Ural Yekaterinburg drive forward through Branko Jovicic. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Eric Bicfalvi of Ural Yekaterinburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 18, Ball goes out of play for a Saint Petersburg goal kick.
Saint Petersburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
In the minute 19, Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ural Yekaterinburg have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 21, Saint Petersburg are pushing forward but Sardar Azmoun's finish is wide of the goal.
Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 23, Throw-in Saint Petersburg.
In Ekaterinburg Ural Yekaterinburg's Andrey Panyukov is caught offside.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 25, In Ekaterinburg Saint Petersburg attack through Andrey Mostovoy. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ekaterinburg.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 27, Throw-in Ural Yekaterinburg.
Important block from the Ural Yekaterinburg defence as Andrey Mostovoy fires in a strike for Saint Petersburg.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 29, Ural Yekaterinburg's Andrey Panyukov breaks free at Central Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Saint Petersburg at Central Stadium.
In the minute 30, Saint Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Danijel Miskic (Ural Yekaterinburg) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg at Central Stadium.
Eric Bicfalvi for Ural Yekaterinburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 32, Goal kick for Saint Petersburg at Central Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ekaterinburg.
Saint Petersburg's Andrey Mostovoy is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 34, Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 36, Sergey Karasev signals a Ural Yekaterinburg throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half.
Saint Petersburg's Sardar Azmoun gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
In the minute 40, At Central Stadium, Nikolay Zolotov has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In Ekaterinburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Saint Petersburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Magomed Ozdoev (Saint Petersburg) has received a yellow card from Sergey Karasev.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Sergey Karasev awards Saint Petersburg a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Sergey Karasev will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 45, Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half is over at Central Stadium.
The second-half is underway in Ekaterinburg.
In the minute 47, Sergey Karasev blows against Ural Yekaterinburg's Andrey Panyukov for offside.
Ball safe as Saint Petersburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Saint Petersburg are coming forward and Sardar Azmoun gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 50, Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Ural Yekaterinburg in Ekaterinburg.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Branko Jovicic breaks free at Central Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 51, Sergey Karasev awards Saint Petersburg a goal kick.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
Daniil Krugovoy gets his shot on target but fails to score for Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Ekaterinburg Saint Petersburg attack through Artem Dzyuba. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Central Stadium.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Can Saint Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 61, Ural Yekaterinburg's Eric Bicfalvi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ekaterinburg.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint Petersburg goal kick.
In the minute 63, Malcom for Saint Petersburg drives towards goal at Central Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Attention is being given to Ural Yekaterinburg’s Aleksey Gerasimov and play has been suspended briefly.
Sergey Semak is making the team's first substitution at Central Stadium with Yuri Zhirkov replacing Andrey Mostovoy.
In the minute 65, The away team have replaced Sardar Azmoun with Aleksey Sutormin. This is the second substitution made today by Sergey Semak.
Ural Yekaterinburg’s Aleksey Gerasimov is on his feet again at Central Stadium.
Saint Petersburg's Malcom gets in a shot on goal at Central Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 68, Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Aleksey Sutormin for the away team is judged to be offside.
Andrey Panyukov grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Central Stadium.
In the minute 69, That's a fine assist from Danijel Miskic.
Magomed Ozdoev (Saint Petersburg) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
In the minute 72, Yuriy Matveev (Ural Yekaterinburg) is making a first substitution, with David Karaev replacing Andrey Panyukov.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 74, In Ekaterinburg, Stefan Strandberg of Ural Yekaterinburg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
